Value.label: Notification
Value.Help: Enable to send notifications to associated devices (Group 1) when the state of LED Bulb is changed.

Value.label: Warm White temperature
Value.Help: Adjusting the color temperature in warm white color component. available value: 2700k to 4999k

Value.label: cold white temperature
Value.Help: Adjusting the color temperature in cold white color component. available value:5000k to 6500k
